extendedInfo.description: Navigate the Paris Metro subway underground transport system like a true Parisian. Simple and amazingly fast. This is the ONLY easy-to-use app. to find your way around the Paris Metro. No need to manipulate a map on a tiny screen.  Just input your destination; type or speak.  The phone knows where you are and instantly shows you how to get there.  But you can still find your way with the phone totally unconnected! Previous searches are automatically remembered for instant retrieval.  Or store a trip as a favorite.  One click gives you the return route.

reviews.title: Very basic.
reviews.comment: Great if you already know the Paris metro system ... where the stations are, how they relate to the attractions you wish to visit as a tourist. I don\'t. No map, no \"I\'m lost, where is the closest metro\", no \"I want to see the Eiffel Tower, which station\". Perhaps I missed something. Deleted, found considerably better (for my needs).
reviews.author: Daryl Smith

reviews.title: Very helpful and easy to use
reviews.comment: Used this app for all my Paris trip metro rides. Did its job great - almost never needed to check the maps for correct metros or directions. Very easy navigating the metro with it. Just get into the nearest station, and select the wanted destination. Than follow the app\'s route and you\'re there!  Suggestions for improvements: - Add favorite stations (in oppose to trips), that can be used for the closest station to the hotel for example (normally one would go to/from it every day, buy to/from various destinations) - Add some general metro info (i.e. working hours) - Add navigation options (i.e. minimum changes v.s. fastest)
reviews.author: Armand Leibovich

reviews.title: Fantastic app-just what I need
reviews.comment: This app is just the perfect thing you need if you want to go around Paris by train, which of course is the most convenient option. It works offline, so you don\'t have to worry about data roaming. Moreover it is very accurate. Particularly for a person like me who  is not much good in reading maps, this app is a blessing :)
reviews.author: Pallavi Mittra

reviews.title: Must have
reviews.comment: God this app was perfect. Succinct, accurate, extremely simple and user friendly. I swear this saved my sanity when using the metro in Paris and is way better and easier than any other metro map
reviews.author: Barry Morley

reviews.title: Very useful
reviews.comment: Just came back from Paris, this apps saves you lots of time, especially useful if you are using a android phone and download Paris in Google maps!
reviews.author: Winnie Lam

reviews.comment: Excellent app. Very helpful when travelling in Paris.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Brilliant
reviews.comment: Absolutely wonderful! Saved me on my honeymoon in Paris. Made the metro a breeze. I could not recommend enough!
reviews.author: Tyler Baugh

reviews.title: Best app by far.
reviews.comment: This app was a life saver in and around paris, as many of u already know paris is a maze of trains and undergrounds, rer\'s and metro\'s but this app was brilliant put in start place and destination and it tells u how many stops and which stations to  change at. Can\'t rate this little app highly enough. :-)
reviews.author: David Coe

reviews.title: Very easy!
reviews.comment: The metro is so much easier to navigate now! I just wish Verizon didn\'t screw up with my global data plan. Paid for the data and it doesn\'t work. Oh well. Luckily wifi works too. :)
reviews.author: Corinne Higdon

reviews.title: must have it as turist in paris
reviews.comment: great app. working great on samsung s3 mini and nexus7
reviews.author: Janez Vizjak

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: Used it while I was in Paris last week. Worked every time. Awesome!
reviews.author: Rajesh Pankaj

reviews.title: Very helpful
reviews.comment: Used repeatedly during a recent visit to Paris. Very handy!
reviews.author: Wendy Crandall

reviews.title: A must have
reviews.comment: A must have while visiting Paris... !!!
reviews.author: cwhisperer A

reviews.title: Very useful
reviews.comment: This really helped me while I was in Paris, very easy to use too!
reviews.author: Jose Otavio Carlomagno Filho

reviews.title: Guided me in paris
reviews.comment: Very good to use to get from one station to another.
reviews.author: Soon chee mung

reviews.title: The winner
reviews.comment: I installed a bunch of similar apps before going to Paris and this one turned out to be the winner. Sapienti sat :)
reviews.author: Yuri Leikind

reviews.title: Must have for travellers
reviews.comment: Easy to use when you know the names of the stations you want to travel to.  Use this along with a metro map and you\'re all set for travelling around Paris
reviews.author: Alvin T

reviews.title: Worked well
reviews.comment: Would be even better if it had the metro map included.
reviews.author: Martin R

reviews.title: Brilliant!
reviews.comment: We\'ve just come back from Paris - we used this app all the time! It helped us navigate the metro system so easily and saved loads of time and stress!
reviews.author: A Google User
